name: rrndsxmet
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, wff w0
body: |- wi(w0, wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, co(cr, cmap, c1))))
-| wceq(c0, cmpo(s0, s1, co(cr, cmap, c1), co(cr, cmap, c1), cfv(csqrt, csu(s2, c1, co(co(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s2)), cmin, cfv(cv(s1), cv(s2))), cexp, nat2)))))

stmt.origin: syl(w0, wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, co(cr, cmap, c1))), wcel(c0, cfv(cmet, co(cr, cmap, c1))))

-| wi(wcel(c0, cfv(cmet, co(cr, cmap, c1))), wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, co(cr, cmap, c1))))

comment: ` D ` is an extended metric for the n-dimensional real Euclidean space. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 8-Apr-2021.)
